document.body.innerHTML = ''; var estilo = document.createElement('style'); estilo.type = 'text/css'; estilo.innerHTML = `* {margin: 0; padding: 0; } .imgUsers {background: whitesmoke; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: center; flex-direction: row; } .imgBox {background: white; display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; padding: 10px; box-shadow: 1px 1px 13px black; transform: scale(.97); } .imgBox:hover {box-shadow: 1px 1px 13px gray; } img {width: 100%; box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px; } .div-dados {display: flex; flex-direction: column; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; width: 100%; } p.nmUser {margin-top: 5px; } .index {padding: 20px; background-color: tomato; position: fixed; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 1; }`; document.head.appendChild(estilo); var botao = document.createElement('button'); botao.textContent = 'CARREGAR MAIS'; botao.id = 'clique'; botao.style.position = 'fixed'; botao.style.top = '0'; botao.style.left = '0'; botao.style.zIndex = '9999'; botao.style.padding = '10px'; document.body.appendChild(botao); var divRange = document.createElement('div'); divRange.className = 'index'; var inputNode = document.createElement('input'); inputNode.type = 'range'; divRange.appendChild(inputNode); document.body.appendChild(divRange); var divCards = document.createElement('div');
